name: Introduction to Literary Analysis
description: A practical introduction to concepts, methods and problems of literary analysis, based on a detailed study of selected French and Francophone literary texts from various genres and periods. Students master the basic techniques of literary analysis and use them in short essays. Students must enrol in one two-hour lecture and one two-hour tutorial for a total of four hours per week.
prerequisites: FSL221Y1 or, upon first FRE/FSL enrolment, equivalent as determined by the French Placement Test
